samanera pawidda laba sitina boho denekun owun wisin piriya yuthu shilaya pilibadawa sahena danumak nathiwa, owun wisin piriya yuthu prathipaththi gana danumak nathiwa nomana lesa hasirenu dakimen sanwegayata path wuda, samanera shilaya ha samanerayan wisin piriya yuthu prathipaththi wisthara kara athi dharma granthayak nathi paduwa dutuwa wuda shasanodayakami maha sthawarayan wahansela kihipa namak samanera prathipadawa wisthara kerena dharma granthayak sampadanaya karana lesa apata aaradhana kalaha.
oonema nam, parana paththarayak gini thiyamu.

heta madakalapuwa kodamuneyi kanishta widyalaye nawa demahal pa‡∑ärathamika madhyasthanaya, karuwapankeni wipulananda widyalaye widyagara godanagilla, madakalapu jathika adhyapana pitaye nawa themahal kantha newasikagaraya saha demahal panthi kamara godanagilla, manipuram wigneshwara widyalaye nawa demahal pa‡∑ärathamika igenum myadhasthanaya sisu ayithiyata path kirima saha madakalapuwa guru widyalaye paripalana eekakaya sahitha nawa themahal godanagillata saha siwanatha themahal godanigillata mulgala thabima heta (19) sidu kirimata niyamithaya.
